section.title: Index Configuration
section.para: To create an n-gram index, add a ngram element directly below the root index node. The n-gram index only supports index definitions by qname. The path attribute is not supported (we currently don't see many real use cases for it). Right now, the n-gram index has no additional parameters to be specified; the default settings should just be ok for most cases (we may add extra parameters in the future, e.g. for collapsing/normalizing whitespace).

programlisting.markup: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <collection xmlns="http://exist-db.org/collection-config/1.0"> <index> <lucene> <text qname="SPEECH"> <ignore qname="SPEAKER"/> </text> <text qname="TITLE"/> </lucene> <ngram qname="SPEAKER"/> </index> </collection>
